xml.data:
Home » 13S3 Khandhavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 2 Rādhasaṃyutta » 2.2 Dutiyamāravagga
2.2.5 Dukkhasutta
Rādhasaṃyutta
Dutiyamāravagga
Dukkhasutta
174.
856Sāvatthinidānaṃ. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rādho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca—  “‘dukkhaṃ, dukkhan’ti, bhante, vuccati. Katamaṃ nu kho, bhante, dukkhan”ti? “Rūpaṃ kho, rādha, dukkhaṃ, vedanā dukkhā, saññā dukkhā, saṅkhārā dukkhā, viññāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ. Evaṃ passaṃ…pe…  nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti.
857Pañcamaṃ.
<< 2.2.4 Aniccadhammasuttaup2.2.6 Dukkhadhammasutta >>
